column5: Went out at about 6:30am and fished till about 2. Fishing action was non stop as soon the jig/minnow combo was down. Plenty of small one's for the first few hours. Probably got about 40-50 of those. Then at about 9:30 the jumbos showed up for an hours or so. Some getting up to 12-13'.  Opted to just stay in the one spot. Plenty of ice where i was about 8'. I was only in about 7ft. of water with a little weeds around. Plenty of guys way out. Most were getting just small ones and plenty of them apparently. Be back there soon. Good luck.  Pics to follow.
Thanks for the quick report.  Anyone else getting punchy go jan 1?!!  Edit..  Punchy FOR jan 1st....
"punchy go".. but 4 hours North for me...  As for the OP staying in one spot... never leave fish to find fish.. you did right !
Today was a little slower on Gilford for myself, Dynamic_Bear and Chris K. Lots of small ones but one 2, maybe 3, eaters.
